MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Liverpool Road North, Granville Avenue and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:37pm on 4th November 2020.
